channel.title: Electric Cars on LinuxUK
channel.description: Recent content in Electric Cars on LinuxUK

item.title: Why now is the right time to buy an electric car
item.description: The Promise I’ve been facinated with the idea of electric cars ever since I was young but despite all the promises in the 80’s and 90’s they didn’t materialise in any notable form. But in 2008 Tesla changed all of that with it’s Roadster. Despite the problems Tesla faced the future was clear, electric cars were here to stay. “Frankly, it passed, but it was completely unsafe” - Musk on the early Tesla Roadster The early electric cars were more comical than practical.
